entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
